org.phantomapi.vfx

Class ParticleEffect.ParticleData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.phantomapi.vfx.ParticleEffect.ParticleData
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ParticleEffect.BlockData, ParticleEffect.ItemData
    Enclosing class:
    ParticleEffect

    public abstract static class ParticleEffect.ParticleData
extends Object
    Represents the particle data for effects like ParticleEffect.ITEM_CRACK, ParticleEffect.BLOCK_CRACK and ParticleEffect.BLOCK_DUST

    This class is part of the ParticleEffect Library and follows the same usage conditions

    Since:
    1.6
    Author:
    DarkBlade12

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      Construct a new particle data

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte getData()
      Returns the data value of this data
      org.bukkit.Material getMaterial()
      Returns the material of this data
      int[] getPacketData()
      Returns the data as an int array for packet construction
      String getPacketDataString()
      Returns the data as a string for pre 1.8 versions
